/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with buildings of varying heights, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the urban landscape. Cars and buses, symbols of the city's constant motion, traverse the road, while pedestrians go about their day, adding a human element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
